description: The Z32 300ZX is Nissan's technological tour de force. Twin turbos, a quad-cam V6, four-wheel steering, and a body design that Car and Driver called the best of the 90s. It's a grand tourer with the heart of a sports car and the widebody stance of a supercar.
lore: Widebody dreams. The T-bar roof rattles at highway speed, the twin turbo plumbing looks like modern art under the hood, and changing the spark plugs requires the hands of a surgeon. But when both turbos spool in unison, 300 horsepower arrives with the authority of a freight train.
